body1.name: body1
body1.description: Sets the font properties as Roboto Body 1

body2.name: body2
body2.description: Sets the font properties as Roboto Body 2

button.name: button
button.description: A Material Design button with different variations. It renders as an anchor if href is passed to it.

caption.name: caption
caption.description: Sets the font properties as Roboto Caption

checkbox.name: checkbox
checkbox.description: A Material Design checkbox. Supports aligning label before or after checkbox.

h1.name: h1
h1.description: Sets the font properties as Roboto Headline1

h2.name: h2
h2.description: Sets the font properties as Roboto Headline2

h3.name: h3
h3.description: Sets the font properties as Roboto Headline3

h4.name: h4
h4.description: Sets the font properties as Roboto Headline4

h5.name: h5
h5.description: Sets the font properties as Roboto Headline5

h6.name: h6
h6.description: Sets the font properties as Roboto Headline6

label.name: label
label.description: A simple label component that displays its text in the standard Roboto Material Design font

overline.name: overline
overline.description: Sets the font properties as Roboto Overline

radiobutton.name: radiobutton
radiobutton.description: A Material Design radiobutton. Supports aligning label before or after radiobutton.

sub1.name: sub1
sub1.description: Sets the font properties as Roboto Subtitle1

sub2.name: sub2
sub2.description: Sets the font properties as Roboto Subtitle2

textfield.name: textfield
textfield.description: A Material Design textfield with multiple variants. Can also be converted to a text area / multine text field.
